pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)1$(br)$(#bd951a)Range:$()$(#ff0000)10$(br)$(#bd951a)Fire Rate:$()$(#ff0000)3s$(br)$(#bd951a)Special:$()$(#ff0000)Hypnotizes the toughest zombie before vanishing. Asleep if exposed to light.$(br)$(#bd951a)"Zombies are our friends," asserts Hypno-shroom. "They're badly misunderstood creatures who play a valuable role in our ecology. We can and should do more to bring them round to our way of thinking."

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Hypno-shrooms will make a zombie turn around and fight for you.
